title: ISic003716. I.Sicily inscription 003716
body:
1[---το]ῦ ναοῦ βαινέ[τω---]
2[---ὁ ληφθ]εὶς ἀδικείσητ[αι ἀζημίως? ---]

1[---..]ΥΝΑΟΥΒΑΙΝΕ[..---]
2[---.....]ΕΙΣΑΔΙΚΕΙΣΗΤ[.........---]

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Manganaro;
  • Manganaro reads the traces above line 1 as evidence for a preceding line, proposing: [(?)μηδε]ὶς[παρὰ τὸν ὅρον(?)]; Orsi, more plausibly, saw traces of a decorative motif, and considered line 1 the opening line of the text.

translation

commentary

Orsi considered the text to be of Roman period; Manganaro considered Hellenistic, and reconstructs it as a prohibition to enter a sanctuary (seemingly taking the provenance of the Temple of Concord as certain).

bibliography

    49.1266.8 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796 NSA 1920 338-339 fig.23 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001392 Manganaro 1999 36 no.8 fig.85 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001813
